content.eamr: ( ing-0 "1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese spread" )
( ing-1 "2 teaspoons ranch salad dressing mix" )

content.text: 0) In a bowl, combine cream cheese and dressing mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@14:21 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a bowl"@6:12 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "cream cheese"@22:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "dressing mix"@39:51 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Spread on one side of each slice of bread.
2) Peel cucumbers if desired thinly slice and place on six slices of bread.
